snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include an analysis of a deals to make Beats by Dre headphones, Facebook and European officials resolving a dispute...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Thursday, selections include an analysis of a deals to make Beats by Dre headphones, Facebook and European officials resolving a dispute over facial recognition data and a new agreement between yahoo and Google.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Yahoo-Google Deal and Ladies' Laptop Bags
